content.rendered:
The Glass Bistro Poseur table is a popular table for breakout areas, bistro’s, and similar venues.

The Glass Bistro Poseur table is only suitable for moderate commercial use.

It has a stylish glass top with a chrome column for a contemporary look.

Held in stock for delivery in 4-5 working days.

This item requires basic self assembly. Suitable for indoor use.
